notifyChanged().Description: Notifies UI that the underlying data has changed.

size().Description: Returns the number of items in the adapter.

unregisterAllObservers().Description: Unregisters all DataObservers for this ObjectAdapter.

getPresenter(java.lang.Object).Description: Returns the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Presenter_E@ for the given item from the adapter.

onHasStableIdsChanged().Description: Called when @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ObjectAdapter#setHasStableIds_E@ is called and the status of stable ids has changed.

isImmediateNotifySupported().Description: Returns true if the adapter pairs each underlying data change with a call to notify and false otherwise.

Parameters: int: Starting position of the removed items.
int: Total number of items that has been removed.
notifyItemRangeRemoved(int, int).Description: Notifies UI that some items that has been removed.

getId(int).Description: Returns the id for the given position.

Parameters: int: Position where new items has been inserted.
int: Count of the new items has been inserted.
notifyItemRangeInserted(int, int).Description: Notifies UI that new items has been inserted.

Parameters: int: Starting position of the changed items.
int: Total number of items that changed.
notifyItemRangeChanged(int, int).Description: Notifies UI that some items has changed.

getPresenterSelector().Description: Returns the presenter selector for this ObjectAdapter.

onPresenterSelectorChanged().Description: Called when @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ObjectAdapter#setPresenterSelector_E@ is called and the PresenterSelector differs from the previous one.

get(int).Description: Returns the item for the given position.

setHasStableIds(boolean).Description: Sets whether the item ids are stable across changes to the underlying data.

hasStableIds().Description: Returns true if the item ids are stable across changes to the underlying data. When this is true, clients of the ObjectAdapter can use @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ObjectAdapter#getId_E@ to correlate Objects across changes.

ClassDesc: Base class adapter to be used in leanback activities. Provides access to a data model and is decoupled from the presentation of the items via @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PresenterSelector_E@.
